ing: 8 oranges, peeled and cut into chunks
des: "This is a great summer or special occasion fruit salad. I don't like the marshmallows or cream in fruit salad so this one rocks for me and reminds me of my momma. Sprinkle a little sugar on top if desired."
ins: Toss oranges, apple, crushed pineapple, coconut, and cherries together in a bowl; refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
